text: ‘‘nam'modeya, visvasadedege nam'mannu kareyuttidda hagu ‘‘nim'ma odeyanalli visvasavidiri’’ ennuttiddavana kareyannu navu kelidevu mattu navu visvasavittevu. Nam'modeya, namagagi nam'ma papagalannu ksamisu. Nam'ma kedukugalannella nam'minda duragolisu mattu namage sajjanara sangadalli maranavannu nidu’’
